common.serverNotResponding: Server not responding. Please restart manually.

nav.updateConfirm: Have you created a backup and want to continue?
nav.rollbackConfirm: Do you want to return to the previous version?

filters.timeFrame: Bar display: Summarize trades per day, week or month
filters.endBeforeStart: End date cannot be before start date

dashboard.cumulativePnlTooltip: Sum of all gains and losses in the selected period
dashboard.plRatioTooltip: Ratio of avg win to avg loss per trade. Value > 1 means winning trades are on average larger than losing trades.
dashboard.mfePlRatioTooltip:
Maximum Favorable Excursion / P&L.
Shows how much of the max profit potential was actually realized.
High value = profits taken too early.
Value near 1 = optimal exit.
dashboard.tradingFeesTooltip: Fees for opening and closing positions (Maker/Taker fees).
dashboard.fundingFeesTooltip: Periodic financing fees for holding open futures positions. Charged every 8 hours. Negative values = received funding.
dashboard.cumulativePnlChartTooltip: Bars show daily profit/loss. The line shows the cumulative progression over the period.
dashboard.winRateTooltip: Percentage of winning trades relative to total trades per time period.
dashboard.byWeekdayTooltip: Performance grouped by weekday of trade entry. Shows which days you trade best/worst.
dashboard.byEntryTimeTooltip: Performance grouped by time of trade entry. Shows at which times of day you trade best/worst.
dashboard.byDurationTooltip: Performance grouped by hold duration (entry to exit). Shows whether you perform better with shorter or longer trades.
dashboard.heatmapTooltip:
Shows average performance by weekday and hour.
Green = profitable time slots, Red = losing time slots.
Helps identify optimal trading times.
dashboard.tradingPerformanceTooltip:
PnL: Profit/Loss per Trade
Equity: Cumulative Equity Curve
High Water Mark: Previous High
Drawdown: Decline from Peak
dashboard.byPositionTooltip: Performance grouped by Long/Short. Shows whether you trade better in one direction.
dashboard.byStrategyTooltip: Performance grouped by strategy tags (first tag group). Shows which strategies are profitable.
dashboard.bySymbolTooltip: Performance per symbol, sorted by profitability.
dashboard.feesBySymbolTooltip: Total trading fees (commissions) per symbol. Shows where the most costs occur.
dashboard.tradeTypeStatsTooltip: Detailed statistics per trade type (Scalp/Day/Swing): trade count, win rate, avg P&L, total P&L, profit factor.
dashboard.strategyTagStatsTooltip: Detailed statistics per strategy tag: trade count, win rate, avg P&L, total P&L, profit factor.
dashboard.mfeAnalysisTooltip: Shows loss trades that were in profit at some point (based on MFE). Helps improve exit management.
dashboard.lossTradesInProfit: Loss trades that were in profit
dashboard.ofLossTradesWereInProfit: {count} of {total} loss trades were in profit at some point

settings.balanceDescription: Dashboard balance = Initial deposit + all trade results. Click Calculate from API to automatically back-calculate the initial deposit from your {broker} account balance.
settings.manualOrApi: Enter manually or calculate automatically from the API.
settings.apiConnectionDescription: Connect your exchange accounts to import trades automatically.
settings.passphraseHint: The passphrase is set when creating the API key on Bitget.
settings.importFromDateHint: Trades before this date will be ignored. Empty = all trades.
settings.tagsDescription: Create tag groups and tags to categorize your trades.
settings.timeframesDescription: Select the timeframes you use when trading. These will appear in Pending Trades and Playbook.
settings.tradeTypeAutoDetectionDescription: In the closing evaluation, the trade type is automatically set based on hold duration. You can manually override it.
settings.tradeTypeThresholdHint: Everything above the day trade threshold is detected as swing trade.
settings.popupsDescription: Show trade evaluation popups when opening and closing positions.
settings.browserNotificationsHint: Desktop notification when an AI report is ready or an API import is complete (only when tab is not focused).
settings.aiEnabledHint: Hides AI Agent from menu and dashboard. Settings are preserved.
settings.kiDescription: Configure the AI provider for automatic report generation. Ollama (local, free) or Online AI (OpenAI/Anthropic/Gemini/DeepSeek, requires API key).
settings.ollamaUrlHint: Default: http://localhost:11434 — Change the URL if Ollama is running on a different server.
settings.loadModelsHint: Click "Test connection" to load the models.
settings.reportPromptPlaceholder: Additional instructions for AI report generation... (empty = default prompt)
settings.reportPromptHint: These instructions are added to the default prompt. Use this to influence the style, focus and detail level of the report.
settings.enableChatHint: Enables chat follow-up questions under each AI report. The AI receives the report as context.
settings.dbDescription: SQLite (local, default) or PostgreSQL (remote, e.g. on NAS/Server). Server restart required after switching.
settings.pgProviderDesc: No own server? These providers offer free PostgreSQL databases:
settings.backupDescription: Backs up all data (Trades, Screenshots, Settings, API Keys, AI Reports, DB Configuration) as JSON backup. API Keys remain encrypted.
settings.ohlcDescription: Show candlestick chart with Binance data in trade detail (free, no API key needed).
settings.duplicatesDescription: Detects and removes duplicate imported trades. Evaluated trades (with notes) are not deleted.
settings.duplicatesRemoved: {removed} duplicate trades removed, {merged} duplicate days merged. {kept} evaluated trades kept.
settings.bitgetCause1: API Key, Secret Key or Passphrase are incorrect
settings.bitgetCause2: IP Whitelist: Your server IP is not whitelisted in the API key configuration
settings.bitgetCause3: API Key type: Make sure "HMAC" is selected as the encryption method
settings.bitgetCause4: Permissions: The API key needs "Futures" read permissions
settings.repairDescription: Corrects the Long/Short assignment of all existing trades based on Entry/Exit price and P&L direction.
settings.fundingFeeRepairDescription: Fetches trading and funding fees separately from the Bitunix API and updates existing trades. Bitunix API key required.
settings.importsDescription: Be careful when deleting imports. Screenshots, tags, notes and satisfaction ratings are preserved.
settings.fluxDescription: Generate stylish share images for your trades with FLUX.2 AI image generation by Black Forest Labs.
settings.fluxModelHint: Higher quality models cost more per image.
settings.fluxAvatarHint: Default: App logo. Optionally upload your own image.

setup.welcomeText: Welcome to Crypto Trading Journal. This setup will help you configure the basics.
setup.chooseDatabaseText: Choose where your data should be stored.
setup.sqliteDescription: Simple file database. No additional software needed. Ideal for single-user usage.
setup.postgresDescription: External database server. For NAS, server or when multiple devices should access it.
setup.sqliteAutoCreated: SQLite database will be created automatically.
setup.postgresChosen: You have chosen PostgreSQL. The database configuration has been saved.
setup.restartServer: Please restart the server for the new database to be used.
setup.nextStepSettings: Go to {settings} to set up your timezone and accounts
setup.nextStepImport: Import your first trades via {csv} or {api}
setup.postgresUsedOnRestart: PostgreSQL connection will be used on next start.
setup.restartStep1: Stop the current server (Ctrl+C or close the window)
setup.restartStep2: Start the server again (double-click on desktop shortcut)

incoming.emotionsPlaceholder: How do you feel about this trade?
incoming.errorCreatingPosition: Error creating position in Pending Trades
incoming.closingEmotionsPlaceholder: How did you feel at closing?

addTrades.csvDescription: Import your {broker} CSV export. Only rows with "Futures Profit" and "Futures Loss" will be processed.
addTrades.apiDescription: Import trades directly from your {broker} account. Configure your API keys in Settings.
addTrades.alreadyImported: The following data has already been imported:
addTrades.noPositionsFound: No positions found for the selected time period.
addTrades.allAlreadyImported: All positions in this time period have already been imported.
addTrades.noCsvData: No data found in CSV file
addTrades.noValidBitgetTrades: No valid trades found in Bitget CSV

kiAgent.totalTokensHint: Total token usage (Reports + Chat + Trade reviews)
kiAgent.ollamaNotReachable: Make sure Ollama is running and the URL in Settings is correct.
kiAgent.apiKeyMissing: No API key configured. Add your key in Settings.

imports.deleteWarning: Deleting an import will also delete excursions. Screenshots, tags, notes and satisfaction ratings are preserved.
imports.deleteCareful: Be careful when deleting imports. Screenshots, tags, notes and satisfaction ratings are preserved.

auswertung.tooltipLongShort: Proportion of long trades to all trades. 50% = balanced ratio.
auswertung.tooltipSatisfaction: Proportion of trades/days where you were satisfied.
auswertung.tooltipCompleteness: Proportion of trades where you filled in at least one journal field.
auswertung.tooltipTagGroup: Analysis of tag group "{name}". Green = Wins, Red = Losses.
auswertung.tooltipTimeframe: Which chart timeframes you use most. Green = Win Rate ≥ 50%, Yellow = below 50%.
auswertung.tooltipStressProgress: Development of your stress level over time (1-10).
auswertung.tooltipStressVsWin: Win Rate grouped by stress level.
auswertung.tooltipEmotionProgress: Development of your emotion level over time (1-10).
auswertung.tooltipEmotionVsWin: Win Rate grouped by emotion level.
auswertung.tooltipCompletenessRadar: How completely you maintain your trading journal.

daily.volTooltip: Total number of securities during the trade (bought + sold or shorted + covered)
daily.pnlPerUnitTooltip: PnL per unit of security traded (bought or shorted)
daily.mfeTooltip: Maximum Favorable Excursion: Best price during the trade. Long = highest High, Short = lowest Low. Automatically calculated from Binance 1m data.
daily.shareCardNoKey: No FLUX API key. Please configure in Settings.
daily.shareCardHint: Create a stylish share image for this trade with an AI-generated background.

excursions.missingMfeDates: MFE prices are missing for the following dates:
excursions.allUpToDate: all MFE prices are up to date.
excursions.configureApiKey: To automatically add MFE prices, enter your API key in {link}.
